short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicky search and open bookmarks using fuzzy search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The last extension for finding bookmarks you will ever need.

Use `Ctrl + Shift + F` to bring up a fuzzy search for your bookmarks. (If the shortcut does not work, check extension keyboard shortcuts in settings).

Note: The overlay does not work on edge:// pages (including the default homepage).
